about.title: About CRIC AFRIKA SARL
about.subtitle: Leader in industrial equipment in Cameroon for over 15 years
storyContent: Founded in 2008, <1>CRIC Africa SARL</1> was born from the vision of creating a Cameroonian company capable of meeting the growing needs of the industrial sector for quality equipment and professional technical services.
Since our beginnings, we have supported more than <1>80 companies</1> in their installation, maintenance and equipment optimization projects.
Today, CRIC Africa is a team of <1>45 qualified professionals</1>, partnerships with major international brands, and a presence throughout Cameroon.
